Articles.Content:
Why do my posts needs to be approved by a moderator (again)? I'm here for years and could post without someone from the staff to look over it...

Edit: Forget it... it's only in some more important sub-forums which is ok and understandable.
For those reading this after StanE's discovery, posts in threads in the Announcements subforum always need to be approved by a moderator, in addition to the first three posts from a new user.
